project_name.justification: The text refers to the project as 'the Company’s Beartrack-Arnett Gold Project (“Beartrack-Arnett”) located in Idaho, USA.'

company_name.justification: The company is identified as 'Revival Gold Inc. (TSXV: RVG, OTCQX: RVLGF) (“Revival Gold” or the “Company”).'

ceo_buyer.justification: The text quotes 'Hugh Agro, President & CEO.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article describes an expansion of land position via staking claims ('Fifty-seven lode claims encompassing 476 hectares have been staked'), not the acquisition of a percentage interest from another company.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is referred to as the 'Beartrack-Arnett Gold Project' and the resource is quantified in 'g/T gold'.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source documents. The content of the document is verified to be about the Beartrack-Arnett project.

currency.justification: The company is listed on the TSX Venture Exchange ('TSXV: RVG') and the detailed quote section uses a '$' symbol, which implies Canadian Dollars (CAD) for a Canadian exchange.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction described is a land expansion via staking claims, not a purchase from another entity, so no cash payment was made.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction described is a land expansion via staking claims, not a purchase from another entity, so no share payment was made.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction described is a land expansion via staking claims, not a purchase from another entity, so no combined payment was made.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction described is a land expansion via staking claims, not a purchase from another entity, so no shares were issued as consideration.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the land expansion.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the land expansion.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction described is a land expansion via staking claims, not a purchase from another entity, so no shares were issued as consideration, and thus there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The article discusses past and future drilling but does not mention a specific drilling commitment in meters as part of a transaction.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The article discusses future exploration plans but does not state a specific monetary commitment as part of a transaction.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: There is no mention of a Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained in the text.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: 'Fifty-seven lode claims encompassing 476 hectares have been staked to increase Revival Gold’s land position...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: 'Fifty-seven lode claims encompassing 476 hectares have been staked...'

resource_size.value: 86.2 million tonnes at 0.87 g/T gold containing 2.42 million ounces of gold, and an Inferred Mineral Resource of 50.7 million tonnes at 1.34 g/T gold containing 2.19 million ounces of gold
resource_size.justification: The text states the project has a 'Measured & Indicated Mineral Resource of 86.2 million tonnes at 0.87 g/T gold containing 2.42 million ounces of gold, and an Inferred Mineral Resource of 50.7 million tonnes at 1.34 g/T gold containing 2.19 million ounces of gold'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer, Revival Gold Inc., is identified with the ticker and exchange in the text: 'Revival Gold Inc. (TSXV: RVG, OTCQX: RVLGF)'.
